column1: 599599,Weights and Measures Inspector,,"Inspect shipments to ensure correct order fulfilment
column3: Inspect items for damage or defects
column5: Calculate weights, volumes or other characteristics of materials
column9: Attach identification information to products, items or containers
column17: Discuss goods or services information with customers or patrons
column21: Signal others to coordinate work activities
column25: Collect samples of materials or products for testing
